report.title: Explore records using standard filters - lores mapping
report.description: Report designed for mapping on the explore records facility in iRecord, with standardised filtering parameters. Aggregated to grid squares.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id JOIN cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist#

param.name: default_input_form
param.description: Input form path to use when no other available

param.name: sq_size
param.description: Specify either 1000, 2000 or 10000 for the grid square resolution as 1km, 2km or 10km grid

joins.join: JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=o.map_sq_1km_id and msq.size=1000
JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=o.map_sq_2km_id and msq.size=2000
JOIN map_squares msq on msq.id=o.map_sq_10km_id and msq.size=10000

param.name: bounds
param.description: Well known text for the bounding box to load

column.name: source
column.sql: snf.website_title || ' | ' || case when substring(snf.survey_title from 1 for length(snf.website_title)) = snf.website_title then trim(substring(snf.survey_title from length(snf.website_title)+1)) else snf.survey_title end

column.name: recorder
column.sql: CASE WHEN LENGTH(snf.recorders)>30 THEN 'Recorder' ELSE snf.recorders END

column.name: associated_with
column.sql: (select string_agg(case when cttlassoc.default_common_name is null then '' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || '' else cttlassoc.default_common_name || ' (' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || ')' end, ', ') from occurrence_associations oa join cache_occurrences_functional oassoc on oassoc.id=oa.to_occurrence_id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlassoc on cttlassoc.id=oassoc.taxa_taxon_list_id where oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id )

column.name: association_detail
column.sql: (select string_agg( case when oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id then case when o.default_common_name is null then 'c' || o.preferred_taxon || '' else o.default_common_name || ' (' || o.preferred_taxon || ')' end else case when cttlassoc.default_common_name is null then '' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || '' else cttlassoc.default_common_name || ' (' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || ')' end end || ' ' || assoctype.term || ' ' || case when oa.to_occurrence_id=o.id then case when o.default_common_name is null then '' || o.preferred_taxon || '' else o.default_common_name || ' (' || o.preferred_taxon || ')' end else case when cttlassoc.default_common_name is null then '' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || '' else cttlassoc.default_common_name || ' (' || cttlassoc.preferred_taxon || ')' end end || coalesce(' ' || assocpos.term, '') || coalesce(' ' || assocpart.term, '') || coalesce(' resulting in ' || associmpact.term, ''), ', ') from occurrence_associations oa join cache_occurrences_functional oassoc on oassoc.id=oa.to_occurrence_id join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttlassoc on cttlassoc.id=oassoc.taxa_taxon_list_id JOIN cache_termlists_terms assoctype on assoctype.id=oa.association_type_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms assocpart on assocpart.id=oa.part_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms assocpos on assocpos.id=oa.position_id LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms associmpact on associmpact.id=oa.impact_id where oa.from_occurrence_id=o.id )

column.name: input_form
column.sql: case when o.input_form is null then '#default_input_form#' else o.input_form end
